name: GenPro
author: Mahmoud Ofeisa

sections.description: You can use this plugin in your website to add list of serial numbers and guarantee (optional) for your products in the dashboard and after that you can use a short code to display check form in a post or page to check your product if it is orginal or not using serial number or serial number and guarantee.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Genpro settings screen to configure the plugin
  4. Copy the short code and paste it to use it in a post or page.
    [genpro-check-serial]
sections.faq:
Is GenPro free?

Yes! GenPro’s core features are and always will be free.

short_description: You can use this plugin in your website to add list of serial numbers and guarantee (optional) for your products in the dashboard and after that user  …
description: You can use this plugin in your website to add list of serial numbers and guarantee (optional) for your products in the dashboard and after that you can use a short code to display check form in a post or page to check your product if it is orginal or not using serial number or serial number and guarantee.

screenshots.caption: Plugin settings: you can use guarantee or not and use your custom settings for the plugin.
Serials list: you can add your serials and guarantees here and delete them.
Check form: after pasting the short code the form will appear in your page or post after that you can use the form to check your product if it is orignal or not.
